title: Western Embroidered Cowboy Shirts for Men, Casual Button Down Long Sleeve Shirt Floral Design Retro Shirt
description: Snap Closure--easy to take care of;
High quality fabric: Cotton and polyester blended, soft and cotton touch; Easy to wash-- machine wash, Hang to dry, Low iron if necessary, Do not bleach;

Traditional western details: two-tone embroidery on yokes and sleeve cuffs. Thick, full embroidery makes the shirt more exquisite，high-quality,more attractive on the occasion; Real smiley pockets with embroidered arrow, you can put your eyeglasses in the pockets;
Candycane piping throughtout yokes, pockets and cuffs;

Notice:This shirt is in Hispanic size.If you come from the white community, please go for one size bigger. And If you are not sure which size to choose, please check the sizelist before ordering, or you can send message including your weight and height to us, we will offer professional advice for you;
